subject: RE: [junit] Hi, I am a newbie.
msgSnippet: ... You should also look at http://www.objectmentor.com/resources/articles/TheHumbleDialogBox.pdf ... There are also other tools besides JFCUnit, try a google
messageBody:
> Hi,
> I am new in this group. I started using junit 7 days
> ago. It works very well with the classes without any
> GUI. But how do you use it to test JFC Swing stuff?

You should also look at
http://www.objectmentor.com/resources/articles/TheHumbleDialogBox.pdf

> What is JFCUnit, where can I get it?

There are also other tools besides JFCUnit, try a google search
for "java untit test gui"

Bernd

> Thanks .
>
> Shirley
